answers.answer: hi there those symptoms sound like a kidney infection to me especially the weak bladder.stinging and lower back pain.. get yourself off to a doctor if you can.
please go get that checked out it sounds serious

HiWelcome to the MedHelp forum!Immediately check for high temperature, UTI, diabetes and possibility of anemia, thyroid problems and liver problems. Your symptoms could also be due to pinched cervical spinal nerves causing neck pain.Please consult your PCP for primary examination followed by proper referral.Take care!

question: for about a week now i have had quite bad aches and pains generally in lower back and neck, dizzy spells, sweats(day and night), weak bladder and slight sting when i urinate, tiredness, difficulty breathing at times, headaches but i get them all the time anyway made worse by the aching neck, i havnt had an apetite for 3 days now
